name: Depths of the Industrial Complex
description:
A short journey deep into a seemingly abandoned factory in the middle of nowhere.

This short horror-ish 3D adventure platformer was created for Ludum Dare 48 in 72 hours. All of the assets were made by our team during the jam - sfx, music, 3d models, textures. The game was created using Godot engine.

Version 1.0.2 update:

  - Fixed the game not starting, when a player has already beaten it

  - Fixed a bug, that caused tutorials not showing up and a white animated fade at the start of each level

  - Fixed a menu screen not having correct music in the background

  - Dropped resolution of an oversized skybox, making the downloadable file 23 MB smaller
